item.title: Android service binding fix for API 30
item.description: TL;DR If you want to use bindService() with external application services built with API 30 and above, add the attribute with the service package name to the client app manifest. More info in the documentation. Without it, bindService() will return False and the logs will tell you that an Intent-compatible service has not been found. My repo with a working example Problem I am recently working on communication between applications in Android.
